# Badges para o README

Adicione estes badges ao seu README.md principal:

```markdown
<!-- Status do Projeto -->
![Status](https://img.shields.io/badge/status-active-success.svg)
![Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/version-1.0.0-blue.svg)
![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-blue.svg)

<!-- Tecnologias -->
![React Native](https://img.shields.io/badge/React_Native-0.81-61DAFB?logo=react)
![Expo](https://img.shields.io/badge/Expo-54-000020?logo=expo)
![FastAPI](https://img.shields.io/badge/FastAPI-0.104-009688?logo=fastapi)
![Python](https://img.shields.io/badge/Python-3.11-3776AB?logo=python)
![OpenAI](https://img.shields.io/badge/OpenAI-GPT--3.5-412991?logo=openai)

<!-- Build Status -->
![CI](https://github.com/seu-usuario/finmarket/workflows/CI/badge.svg)
![Deploy](https://github.com/seu-usuario/finmarket/workflows/Deploy/badge.svg)

<!-- Code Quality -->
![Code Style](https://img.shields.io/badge/code_style-prettier-ff69b4.svg)
![Linting](https://img.shields.io/badge/linting-eslint-4B32C3.svg)

<!-- Stats -->
![GitHub issues](https://img.shields.io/github/issues/seu-usuario/finmarket)
![GitHub pull requests](https://img.shields.io/github/issues-pr/seu-usuario/finmarket)
![GitHub stars](https://img.shields.io/github/stars/seu-usuario/finmarket?style=social)
![GitHub forks](https://img.shields.io/github/forks/seu-usuario/finmarket?style=social)

<!-- Contributions -->
![Contributions welcome](https://img.shields.io/badge/contributions-welcome-brightgreen.svg)
![PRs Welcome](https://img.shields.io/badge/PRs-welcome-brightgreen.svg)
```

## Como Usar

1. Substitua `seu-usuario/finmarket` pelo seu repositório
2. Cole os badges no topo do README.md
3. Customize as cores e estilos conforme preferir

## Shields.io

Mais badges em: https://shields.io/

## Exemplos de Customização

### Badge Personalizado
```markdown
![Custom](https://img.shields.io/badge/custom-badge-color?style=for-the-badge&logo=icon)
```

### Estilos Disponíveis
- `flat` (padrão)
- `flat-square`
- `plastic`
- `for-the-badge`
- `social`

### Cores
- `brightgreen`
- `green`
- `yellowgreen`
- `yellow`
- `orange`
- `red`
- `blue`
- `lightgrey`
- Hex: `#ff69b4`
